name: whois-mcp
description: MCP server that performs whois lookup against domain, IP, ASN and TLD.

tools.name: whois_domain
tools.description: Looksup whois information about the domain

tools.name: whois_tld
tools.description: Looksup whois information about the Top Level Domain (TLD)

tools.name: whois_ip
tools.description: Looksup whois information about the IP

tools.name: whois_as
tools.description: Looksup whois information about the Autonomous System Number (ASN)

prompts.name: Look up WHOIS information
prompts.description: Using the Whois MCP to find out domain details.
prompts.text: What can you tell me about example.com?
